medium: Porcelain with enamel decoration and gilding
title: Dessert plate with seated figure
description: Plate, ceramic-porcelain, seated figure eating out of a bowl with Greek vase at his feet, French, XIXc cat. card dims H 1-1/4 x diam 9-1/8\' Holiday Traditions, French Room. Part of a dessert service that has been attributed to Pièrre André Le Guay (active 1773-1817), and Joseph Leopold Weydinger (active 1778-1829)
